page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: We wish to acknowledge the help of the following - {For pages 2,3,9,10,11,15. Mrs. H. Broadhead, Mr. E.M. Hannon, Mr. G. Davies, Mr. C.J. Mitchell, Mr. D. Jennings, Mrs. S. Braviner, Mrs. E. McCarthy, Mr. T.Condon, Mr. B.L. Donellan,Mrs. B. Strafford and the 3rd year pupils of Thornes House High School. {For pages 8,12,13,16,18,19. Mr. G. Robinson, his colleagues and pupils of Sandal Endowed Middle School and particularly Andrew Youde, Mr. R. Youde and John Linley. {For pages 4,5,6,7,14,17.} Mr. B. Pitt and his colleagues at Kettlethorpe Middle School, especially Alexandra Sissons, Helen Hobson, Joanne Dean and Claire Higgs.
